class Towel:
    def __init__(self,color:str,size:str):
        self.color:str=color
        self.size:str=size
        self.wetness:int=0


print("Qual a cor da sua toalha?")
color=input()
size=input()
towel:Towel=Towel(color,size)
print(f"Sua toalha é {towel.color}")
